name: Tachyon Reef: Early Access
description:
Tachyon Reef has been Greenlit! Thanks to all who voted.

PROMOTION - WIN A FREE KEY!

Download the demo, and use the tools to create something cool. Tweet your best screenshots to @fivearchers, hashtag #contest and I will choose 5 winners to receive a free Tachyon Reef key!
Contest ends Friday, May 9th

A note on Early Access:

By purchasing early access, you'll be helping me, as a solo developer to get the game made! You'll also get to see the game grow as I release development snapshots. Plus you'll get a Steam when Tachyon Reef is released on Steam!

Gameplay flow:

Explore the reef, using your discoveries to fund better equipment and submarines! Dig out the voxel landscape, build a giant base, or just explore the Reef and its inhabitants.

Pacing & Atmosphere:
Tachyon Reef will be a game of exploration and building. There is danger in the reef, but you can face it at your own pace. Watch your power levels, watch were you're going, don't run with scissors, and you may survive to share your discoveries!

Latest Updates:

2015-05-05 - Windows Build updated with a friendly little drone - press enter and he'll build you a platform - much more to come with this little guy!
